title: Philadelphia with love
creator_credit: James A. Love, Bell Telephone Company of Pennsylvania and Nassau Film Productions
brief_description: Shows the modern city of Philadelphia, a beneficiary of urban renewal, a city where sports and cultural opportunities are readily available. Describes the parks, museums, institutions of higher learning, the city government and the office of the mayor. “Philadelphia with love” sung by Sergio Franchi. Narration by Joel Craeger.
